con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="library.io.github.walterwhites" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="library.io.github.walterwhites" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="library.io.github.walterwhites"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="library.io.github.walterwhites" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="getBookRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getBookResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="book" type="tns:book"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getBookFromIdRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getBookFromIdResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="book" type="tns:book"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="book"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="author" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="languages" type="tns:language"/> <xs:element name="state" type="tns:state"/> <xs:element name="loan_start_date" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="loan_end_date" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="libraries" type="xs:anyType"/> <xs:element name="clients" type="xs:anyType"/> <xs:element name="loans" type="xs:anyType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="language"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="fr"/> <xs:enumeration value="en"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="state"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="free"/> <xs:enumeration value="borrowed"/> <xs:enumeration value="unavailable"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getBookRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getBookRequest" name="getBookRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getBookResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getBookResponse" name="getBookResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getBookFromIdRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getBookFromIdRequest" name="getBookFromIdRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getBookFromIdResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getBookFromIdResponse" name="getBookFromIdResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="BooksPort"> <wsdl:operation name="getBook"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getBookRequest" name="getBookRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getBookResponse" name="getBookResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getBookFromId"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getBookFromIdRequest" name="getBookFromIdRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getBookFromIdResponse" name="getBookFromIdResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="BooksPortSoap11" type="tns:BooksPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getBook"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getBookRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getBookResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output>
